Lab Operations

Our Testing Services

Comprehensive testing solutions tailored to your specific requirements, delivered with precision and reliability.

Material Composition Testing

Comprehensive analysis of materials to determine elemental composition, alloy verification, and identify contaminants.

Turnaround: 3-5 Business Days

Mechanical Property Testing

Evaluating tensile strength, hardness, impact resistance, and fatigue performance of materials and components.

Turnaround: 5-7 Business Days

Chemical Analysis

Qualitative and quantitative analysis of chemicals, compounds, and mixtures to ensure compliance with specifications.

Turnaround: 4-6 Business Days

Environmental Testing

Evaluating performance under various environmental conditions including temperature, humidity, and corrosive atmospheres.

Turnaround: 7-10 Business Days

Non-Destructive Testing

Inspection techniques that do not damage the tested items, including ultrasonic, radiographic, and magnetic particle testing.

Turnaround: 2-3 Business Days

Failure Analysis

Comprehensive investigation of component failures to determine root causes and recommend preventive measures.

Turnaround: 10-14 Business Days

Our Testing Process

We follow a rigorous, systematic approach to ensure accurate and reliable test results

1

Sample Reception

Reception and logging of test samples with detailed client requirements

2

Test Planning

Development of a comprehensive testing methodology and protocol

3

Sample Preparation

Preparation of samples according to standardized procedures

4

Initial Testing

Preliminary testing to establish baseline parameters

5

Comprehensive Analysis

In-depth testing using state-of-the-art equipment and methodologies

6

Data Collection

Systematic recording and analysis of test results

7

Quality Control

Verification of results against established standards and specifications

8

Reporting

Detailed documentation of findings with interpretation and recommendations

State-of-the-Art Laboratory Facilities

Our laboratories are equipped with cutting-edge technology to deliver precise and reliable testing results

Material Testing Lab

Advanced equipment for comprehensive material analysis and characterization

Chemical Analysis Facility

Specialized instruments for precise chemical composition determination

Mechanical Testing Center

Sophisticated tools for evaluating mechanical properties and performance

Ready to Ensure Your Product Quality?

Our testing experts are ready to help you develop a customized testing program to meet your specific requirements.
